<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Trapsmith Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3134) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 54 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Trapsmith](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=111)

**Prerequisites**
[Snarecrafter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2074) or [Snare Specialist](/Feats.aspx?ID=506)

</column>

---

You use glimmering gears and gnashing mechanisms to manufacture [snares](/Equipment.aspx?Category=31) using specialized parts. Your snares include clockwork and steam-powered cogwheels and gears, and their gush of steam can hinder those you ensnare. If you choose to construct a snare using gears and a creature fails their saving throw against the snare, all creatures are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) to that creature for 1 round, as a burst of steam obscures its vision.

<title level="2">Trapsmith Dedication leads to...</title>
[Finessed Features](/Feats.aspx?ID=3139), [Gear Gnash](/Feats.aspx?ID=3135), [Propeller Attachment](/Feats.aspx?ID=3136), [Recycled Cogwheel](/Feats.aspx?ID=3137), [Repurposed Parts](/Feats.aspx?ID=3138)
name: Trapsmith Dedication
